_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The six cases [sn24.4:4.2]: That which is seen, heard, thought, known, sought, and explored by the mind
Doubt given up by a noble disciple (a re: Doubt in the practice that leads to its cessation
